hero.description: LinguaMaster turns YouTube into your private, AI-powered language immersion lab. Interactive subtitles, context-aware coaching, and a local-first "Second Brain"—all in one native desktop app.

feature1.headline: Designed for Deep Work & Flow
feature1.text: Experience the immersive split-screen Studio Layout. Video on the left, interactive learning on the right. Zero distractions.

feature2.headline: Context-Aware AI Tutor
feature2.text: Don't just translate. Understand. Our AI analyzes specific sentences within the video context for grammar, summary, and cultural nuance.

feature3.headline: A Second Brain for Your Mental Lexicon
feature3.text: Save words with their original video timestamp and context. Review them in a beautiful masonry grid with spaced repetition.

techSpecs.title: Technical Specifications
techSpecs.subtitle: ARCH // Built for power users who care about their data.

localFirst.title: Privacy by Design: Local-First
localFirst.text: Your learning data stays on your machine. We don't track your progress or sell your habits.

byoKey.title: Instant Start. Zero Friction.
byoKey.text: Start instantly with 500 free credits—no setup required. Switch to your own API key anytime for unlimited usage.

electronNative.title: Electron Native
electronNative.text: Blazing fast native performance with full OS integration. Shortcuts, notifications, and offline capability.

credits.subtitle: Generous by Default.

typicalSession.resultText: Master 2-3 videos fully every month for free.

footer.tagline: The modern way to learn languages from authentic content. Built for polyglots, by polyglots.
footer.developerNote: LinguaMaster is an indie developer project. I'm committed to providing the best language learning experience. Due to limited resources, I may not be able to offer 24/7 support, but I appreciate your understanding and feedback via GitHub Issues.
